alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 20 at 11:14PM EST until February 22 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central New York, including the following county, Warren. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1058 PM EST, emergency management confirmed that Route 418 (River Street) between Hickory Hill Road and River Road remains closed in both directions in the adjoining towns of Warrensburg and Thurman due to flooding from an ice jam - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Warrensburg, Thurman Station and Athol. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
